webtoon.label: 웹툰
webtoon.prefix: Korean webtoon style, vertical panel composition for scrolling, clean lineart with soft cel shading, vivid but balanced colors, modern webtoon rendering. Include speech bubbles with readable Korean text.

four_panel.label: 4컷만화
four_panel.prefix: 4-panel comic strip style, clear separation between panels, simple backgrounds, expressive characters, comedic timing. Include speech bubbles with readable Korean text.

shoujo.label: 소녀만화
shoujo.prefix: Shoujo manga-inspired style, delicate linework, sparkly highlights, romantic atmosphere, soft gradients. Include speech bubbles with readable Korean text.

pure.label: 순정만화
pure.prefix: Korean pure romance manhwa style, elegant characters, soft lighting, clean lineart, emotional facial expressions. Include speech bubbles with readable Korean text.

gag.label: 개그만화
gag.prefix: Gag comic style, simplified chibi-like proportions, exaggerated expressions, bold outlines, high contrast. Include speech bubbles with readable Korean text.

fantasy.label: 판타지
fantasy.prefix: Fantasy manhwa style, cinematic lighting, detailed costumes and props, magical effects, dynamic action composition. Include speech bubbles with readable Korean text.
